name: Squeaky Toys And Lasers
description:
Fight Off The Hord. With Random Weapons That May Grant You Epic Lasers Or Nothing But A Squeaky Toy...

Controls: WASD for movement, Move mouse cursor for aiming, Left mouse button to shoot.

All Assets Except For Sound Effects I Made Myself From Scratch. "including music track" - "not all in the jams time frame"

Some Of My Assets Currently On Sale: Unity Bundle - July by StellarNightmare - itch.io
